amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary to report on extraordinary measures the Treasury Department intends to use if the debt limit is not lifted; project how long such measures will fund the Federal government; and project the administrative costs to the Treasury Department associated with taking such actions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 114-420 to require the Secretary to report on extraordinary measures the Treasury Department intends to use if the debt limit is not lifted, project how long such measures will fund the federal government, and project the administrative costs to the Treasury Department associated with taking such actions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Messer amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Messer amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Messer.
